hovertext: Dan Jarvis

£75 received on 21 October 2016 for survey completed on 16 July 2016. Hours: 1 hr.
£75 received on 7 November 2016 for survey completed on 7 September 2016. Hours: 1 hr.
£75 received on 13 December 2016 for survey completed on 24 October 2016. Hours: 70 mins.
£150 received on 12 October 2017 for completion of two surveys on 11 July and 11 September 2017. Hours: 40 mins (20 mins each).
£50 received on 9 January 2017 for completion of a survey on 18 November 2016. Hours: 15 mins.
£100 received on 6 March 2017 for completion of a survey on 14 November 2016. Hours: 20 mins.
£150 received on 19 September 2017 for completion of two surveys on 3 February and 27 June 2017. Hours: 40 mins (20 mins each).
£60 received on 30 November 2016 for survey completed on 7 November 2016. Hours: 15 mins.
£25 received 28 November 2016 for survey completed on 2 September 2016. Hours: 5 mins.
£60 received on 16 December 2016 for a survey completed on 29 November 2016. Hours:  25 mins.
£200 received on 8 August 2017 for a survey completed on 11 July 2017. Hours: 1 hr.
£150 received on 5 October 2016 for appearing on ‘Any Questions’ on 9 September 2016. Hours: 4 hrs.

5 January 2017, received £195.41 in royalties from Biteback Publishing, Westminster Tower, 3 Albert Embankment, London SE1 7
SP, for a book I edited. Hours: no additional hours. This payment has gone towards the costs of my office and supporting my work as a Member of Parliament. (Registered 06 February 2017)

20 January 2017, £250 from the Royal Institute of International Affairs Chatham House, 10 St James's Square, London SW1
Y 4
LE, for an article published in 1 August 2016. Hours: 4 hrs. This payment has gone towards the costs of my office and supporting my work as a Member of Parliament. (Registered 06 February 2017)
